content: k1 round 37 k1 * k1 k2tog repeat from * to last stitch k1 draw working yarn through remaining stitches and pull tightly *optional crochet loop for hanging using tail from top of hat chain 6 slip_stitch in first chain seam doll using tail from top of hat sew the sides of the doll together with an invisible seam scarf scarf is worked flat lengthwise cast on 40 stitches row 1-2 knit cast off knitwise finishing refer to page 4 3 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits for more tips tutorials and project ideas mini snowbuddies a knitting pattern by esther braithwaite designs finishing instructions stuff head sew a running stitch of matching yarn across the first face row row/round 20 then stuff the head firmly draw up to form neck and knot securely do not cut ends as you will use these to define arms as noted below stuff body sew a running stitch of matching yarn across cast-on edge then stuff the body loosely draw up to close bottom of doll and knot securely do not cut ends as you will use this to define the legs define legs begin at the back middle seam and pull yarn through to the front middle count 12 stitches from the back middle seam to the front pull snuggly to create leg definition seam should extend from bottom of feet to row 10 fasten yarn securely define arms use ends from neck gathers to define arms begin your arms 2 row down from neck and 3 stitches from back seam arms are 6 stitches wide and should extend from row/round 18 down to row 13 secure yarn and pull through body to hide ends repeat on opposite side for second arm embroider eyes embroider eyes in black pull a strand of black yarn under both legs of a stitch sew 3 horizontal stitches in the same stitch then pull the needle through the doll and bring up at the opposite side for the second eye make 3 horizontal stitches embroider buttons work in the same manner as eyes 4 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits for more tips tutorials and project ideas
